articles.description: After a report by the Melbourne Age suggests that plans for a two-tier World Test Championship would be discussed later this month, BBC Sport looks at the reaction so far.
articles.title: Two-tier World Test Championship - 'greedy' or needed for cricket to survive?

articles.description: Villarreal's academy has trained stars like Rodri, Nicolas Jackson, Pau Torres and current winger Alex Baena.
articles.title: Inside the Villarreal academy that produced Rodri, Nicolas Jackson and Alex Baena

articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur trigger an option to extend forward Son Heung-min's contract by a year, until the summer of 2026.
articles.title: Son Heung-min: Tottenham Hotspur trigger option to extend forward's contract until 2026

articles.description: Novak Djokovic may be 37, but the 24-time Grand Slam champion can never be counted out as he aims to make more history in Melbourne.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic: Stefan Edberg and Billie Jean King on Serb's 2025

articles.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo registers 11 points, 12 rebounds and a season-high 13 assists as the Milwaukee Bucks beat the Toronto Raptors 128-104 in the NBA.
articles.title: NBA: Giannis Antetokounmpo stars as Milwaukee Bucks beat Toronto Raptors

articles.description: When Nottingham Forest face Liverpool at the City Ground next week it will be a top-of-the-table match that barely anyone could have predicted back in August.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest v Liverpool: Are Nuno Espirito Santo's side Premier League title contenders?

articles.description: England appointed German Thomas Tuchel but there is no shortage of English-born coaches in charge of national teams across the globe.
articles.title: Meet the Englishmen managing national teams abroad

articles.description: Northern Ireland's Tom McKibbin is set for a shock switch to join Jon Rahm's LIV Golf team.
articles.title: Tom McKibbin: NI player set for shock LIV Golf switch with Jon Rahm

articles.description: Novak Djokovic and new coach Andy Murray practise together in Melbourne for the first time before the start of the Australian Open on Sunday.
articles.title: Australian Open: Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray practise together in Melbourne

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says Tomorrow's Golf League (TGL), the technology-driven tournament he is fronting with Tiger Woods, will take golf "into the 21st century".
articles.title: TGL: 'Golf reimagined' - Rory McIlroy and Tiger Woods' tech-driven league begins
